name: Comedy Cam
tag_list: comedy, comedians, comedy-cam, comedycamuk, stand-up, comedy-shows
description: Cam & Video site for comedians shows
overview:
Comedy Cam channel promotes comedy shows and enables comedians and venues to have “pay 2 view” for video recordings and cam of their shows. As founder of Comedy Cam©, I would like to introduce the Comedy Spot service from Comedy Cam© a free service for comedians. The channel web site is for comedy venues & comedians to monetize recordings of comedy shows they do. Is so simple, it works like a mix of Facebook© & Youtube©, if you can use either of these, you can easily use Comedy Cam, but gives the “pay 2 view” facility, up to 50% of online video sales. Shows can be recorded via Web Cam or pro camera or live streaming of shows performed. Comedians content holders have full control & retain copy right of all videos forever. We share additional revenue from online show viewings sales, which can be 50% to you. Comedy Cam spot’s are free, nor any commitment in any way,required.. For full info go to: www.comedycam.info Comedy Cam© a part of Computersoft Limited. Tel: +44 (0) 1945 861815
Direct call: 07864 528586 Email: peter@computersoft.org.uk Skype: easycomputeruk Eastview, Fridaybridge Road, Elm. PE14 0AT. UK Of Course we respect all companies trade mark inc Facebook and Youtube The active show and fan site is at: www.comedycam.co.uk
